name: Ruin
description:
Ruin is a 2D platformer with tight controls where you traverse dangerous traps and difficult obstacles. Escape the levels of Ruin by running and wall jumping your way through 75 hand crafted levels.

  • 75 levels to play through
  • 3 worlds to escape
  • Minimalistic monochromatic 16-bit pixel graphics
  • Atmospheric Soundtrack

Hi, we're Paridot Games. Ruin started out as a 2 week sprint to see what kind of game we could come up, we decided to give ourselves another month to see what we could do with our limited schedule and try and release our first game, we hope you like it.
